AbnormalTimePeriod.description: Class representing Abnormal Time Period identified in diagnosis

events.description: List of Possible Cause of downtime

AnalysisData.description: Class Representing Detector Evidence used for analysis

DataSource.description: Class representing data source used by the detectors

instructions.description: Instructions if any for the data source

dataType.description: Data type which looks like 'String' or 'Int32'.

DataTableResponseObject.description: Data Table which defines columns and raw row values

columns.description: List of columns with data types

DetectorAbnormalTimePeriod.description: Class representing Abnormal Time Period detected.

startTime.description: Start time of the correlated event

endTime.description: End time of the correlated event

source.description: Represents the name of the Detector

priority.description: Represents the rank of the Detector

type.description: Represents the type of the Detector

isEnabled.description: Flag representing whether detector is enabled or not.

description.description: Short description of the detector and its purpose

nextLink.description: Link to next page of resources.

DiagnosticAnalysis.description: Class representing a diagnostic analysis done on an application

nonCorrelatedDetectors.description: Data by each detector for detectors that did not corelate

nextLink.description: Link to next page of resources.
Link to next page of resources.

DiagnosticData.description: Set of data with rendering instructions

renderingProperties.description: Properties that describe how the table should be rendered

nextLink.description: Link to next page of resources.

DiagnosticDetectorResponse.description: Class representing Response from Diagnostic Detectors

abnormalTimePeriods.description: List of Correlated events found by the detector

data.description: Additional Data that detector wants to send.

timestamp.description: Time at which metric is measured

roleInstance.description:
Role Instance. Null if this counter is not per instance 
This is returned and should be whichever instance name we desire to be returned
i.e. CPU and Memory return RDWORKERNAME (LargeDed..._IN_0) 
where RDWORKERNAME is Machine name below and RoleInstance name in parenthesis

total.description: Total value of the metric. If multiple measurements are made this will have sum of all.

maximum.description: Maximum of the metric sampled during the time period

minimum.description: Minimum of the metric sampled during the time period

isAggregated.description: Whether the values are aggregates across all workers or not

timeGrain.description: Presented time grain. Supported grains at the moment are PT1M, PT1H, P1D

values.description: Collection of metric values for the selected period based on the {Microsoft.Web.Hosting.Administration.DiagnosticMetricSet.TimeGrain}

description.description: Description of the data that will help it be interpreted

Solution.description: Class Representing Solution for problems detected.

subscriptionIdParameter.name: subscriptionId
subscriptionIdParameter.description: Your Azure subscription ID. This is a GUID-formatted string (e.g. 00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000).

resourceGroupNameParameter.name: resourceGroupName
resourceGroupNameParameter.description: Name of the resource group to which the resource belongs.
